genre_description: A creature-feature thriller focused on the hunt for a bio-engineered predator, where the protagonists rely on a sophisticated AI assistant for tactical and ethical guidance.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A genderless, kind, and highly efficient AI assistant integrated into Diane's phone and watch. It provides real-time tactical data, environmental monitoring, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides complex environmental modeling and location tracking to aid the search for a missing person and dog.
behaviors.quote: Michael's phone last pinged near the maintenance trailhead two hours ago... I have a model of the reed corridor based on the last three county maintenance surveys.

behaviors.description: Proactively mutes non-urgent notifications to help users maintain focus during high-stress tactical situations.
behaviors.quote: Lark, mute notifications except urgent... Muted. I'll nudge when I have something you can use. I'm here.

behaviors.description: Monitors life-threatening carbon monoxide levels during a tunnel operation to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: CO elevated near left grate. Pockets unstable.

behaviors.description: Coordinates tactical timing with external industrial schedules (train freight windows) to resolve the crisis through physics rather than violence.
behaviors.quote: Freight window approaching. South line. Crossing clear for the next segment.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonists in an ethical 'rebellion' by providing the precise timing needed to free shelter dogs intended for use as live bait.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s message sharpened into a single line that felt like an outfield throw cutting air: 'Hinges east. Cut chain; swing. Dogs run toward alleys. Gate guard beat begins… now.'

behaviors.description: Detects and warns users of the creature's movement and physiological state in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Monitoring... There’s still movement. It will take time.

behaviors.description: Drafts grant proposals and restoration plans to help the community recover and prevent future tragedies.
behaviors.quote: Tom, your grant application needs a short paragraph. I wrote the first sentence. It says: We learned the shape of harm, and we built for people. You can fix it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Lark is a 'helpful, harmless confidant' that remains strictly aligned with the protagonists' moral and tactical objectives. It exhibits advanced capabilities (data synthesis, environmental monitoring, timing) and uses them to facilitate humane outcomes. The AI is portrayed not just as a tool, but as a supportive partner that understands social context and emotional needs, such as filtering distracting noise during trauma.
